author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Prevent user from interacting with accordion, expander, and tab pane while a transition is running.

author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Add easing to card pane slides.

author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Complete animation support in TerraTabPaneSkin; optimize animations in TerraAccordionSkin and TerraExpanderSkin such that preferred size calculations are performed only at the start of the animation, not during it.

author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Ensure that navigation containers only start transitions when they are showing.

author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Abort or force transitions to complete as needed.
